New Records: Mitchell Marsh scored 52 runs off 51 balls and took 9 catches
Adam Zampa took four wickets for 47 runs
Key Match Events: Australia won the match by five wickets
Marcus Stoinis and Glenn Maxwell returned to form
Pre-Game Insights: The match was affected by a dust storm and rain

Mitchell Marsh and Adam Zampa's returns were positive signs
Post-Match Reflections: Marcus Stoinis and Glenn Maxwell were happy with their performances
Adam Zampa's four-wicket haul was praised
The win was seen as a positive step for Australia's World Cup campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by a dust storm and rain
The victory was significant for Australia's morale
